verbose_text: STAT3 downstream genes Bcl-xL and cyclin D1 promote cancer cell survival and proliferation through inhibition of apoptosis and cell cycle progression, respectively, and are frequently overexpressed in human squamous cell carcinomas XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR.
evidence: STAT3 downstream genes Bcl-xL and cyclin D1 promote cancer cell survival
